post.author: Alloy007p
post.body:
A year ago I got stuck on itand figured it out andshortly after stoped playing doom. Now I want to get back to level editing but the problem I can't even start the damn level. I have read the FAQs but they don't seem to help me. So just tell me this If my level is located in
C:/Program Files/Doom 3/maps/map/washroom.map
WHAT EXACTLEY DO I TYPE IN THE CONSLE?

post.author: wal
post.body: Move it from the map folder to the maps folder and type map washroom

post.author: Alloy007p
post.body: Thanks I thought I had to type in something like C:program files/doom 3/base/maps/map/washroom.map

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body:
I think that the right one is
map map/washroom

and

dmap map/washroom
to run bsp
